title.value: This widget shows the list of documents that qualify for Hard Delete. The query is set to default cd_clinical_tmf_doc. Change the DQL query if some other type is set in Hard Delete Configuration.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution

OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
select * from cd_clinical_tmf_doc(all) where a_status ='Withdrawn' order by object_name
